en2: I have allergies whenever I breathe in too much pollen in spring.
I dropped the ball and it fell to the ground because of gravity.
I decided to study entomology because I've always been fascinated by insects.
I shook the box and heard something rattle inside.
I always shake the bottle before using it.
I love watching the cherry trees blossom in spring.
I need to be nimble to keep up with my energetic puppy.
I watched the squirrels forage for acorns in the park.
I value the cultural diversity in our community.
I used to monocrop corn on my farm, but now I grow diverse crops to improve soil health and reduce pests.
I rely on my teammates to help me complete the project on time.
